title: Healthy 3-Ingredient Cookies
directions: Mash bananas in a bowl with a fork.
Stir in oats and chocolate chips.
Place parchment paper over your baking stone or baking sheet.
Using a spoon scoop batter on to your baking sheet in the form of cookies and press each down a little.
Bake for 15 minutes (or until golden - check on them at the 12 minute mark).
Remove from oven and let set on the baking sheet for 5-7 minutes before removing.
Store in a sealed tight container in the refrigerator.
ingredients: 3-4 Large Super Ripe Bananas (measure 2 heaping cups)
